last_episode_to_air.name: Evil Intent
last_episode_to_air.overview: Paranormal activity in Lisa Blakely's home puts her son in danger's way, a shadowy figure terrorizes a young boy, and Micky Bailey falls victim to an evil spirit intent on inflicting harm.

name: Paranormal Survivor
overview: A chilling series in which survivors of a paranormal experience relive their harrowing encounter.

episodes.name: Possessed Objects
episodes.overview: Entities possess an old photograph, a motorbike and even a vintage car, opening up a world of confusion and terror for the owners.

episodes.name: Don’t Invite Them In
episodes.overview: It is never a good idea to invite ghosts to enter your life, as these members of the public found out.

episodes.name: Ghost Children
episodes.overview: Imaginary friends are pretty common for young children. But what happens when that friend is actually a ghost? One man lived to tell the tale, but was maimed for life after getting on the wrong side of his ghostly playmate.

episodes.name: Spirit Protectors
episodes.overview: Sometimes it’s difficult to know if the spirit haunting you is an evil entity or a protective ghost.

episodes.name: Territorial Spirits
episodes.overview: When spirits think you’re intruding on their turf, all hell can break loose. Three members of the public encounter spirits intent on reclaiming their space, at any cost to the humans who have intruded.

episodes.name: When Spirits Talk
episodes.overview: Terrifying messages from beyond the grave leave ordinary people fearing for their safety.

episodes.name: Ghost Soldiers
episodes.overview: Families are devastated when their loved ones die at war, but sometimes the soldiers’ spirits come back to visit the living.

episodes.name: Evil Messengers
episodes.overview: Messages from the spirit world are frightening enough to receive, but when the entity has an evil intent, the results can be truly terrifying.

episodes.name: Multiple Witnesses
episodes.overview: When one person sees a ghost, it could just be a tall tale. But when multiple people see the same spirit? That’s proof of the existence of an entity.

episodes.name: Skeptics Turned Believers
episodes.overview: Three former skeptics of the occult became believers when they experienced firsthand proof of an unworldly plane. Unable to deny the evidence, all became convinced of the existence of ghosts.

episodes.name: Ghost Attacks
episodes.overview: After taking over an old farm Al Kelchener is assaulted by the spirits of the former owners, Ed White is tormented by a demon for over 20 years and Kristen Whitesell is attacked by the ghost of someone close to her.

episodes.name: Evil Intentions
episodes.overview: A tattoo shop is plagued by the ghost of an evil criminal, Tammy Northcutt’s mother-in-law returns from beyond the grave and Michael Vara’s life is put in danger by a malevolent spirit.

episodes.name: An Invitation to Evil
episodes.overview: Seika Groves gets more than she bargained for when she brings home an antique washstand, an evil spirit attaches itself to all those it encounters and Tammy Dean accidentally summons demonic beings into her home.

episodes.name: Messages from Beyond
episodes.overview: TJ Swick’s dreams are invaded by the spirit world with life changing consequences, a teen is targeted with demonic messages and a childhood friend returns from the other side to save Robert Salvas’s life.

episodes.name: Possessed
episodes.overview: A teenager’s obsession with the ghost of a young girl almost proves fatal, a Civil War veteran drives one family to the edge of destruction and Heidi Linden is taken over by a mysterious force.

episodes.name: Child Victims
episodes.overview: An angry spirit torments a young boy in the worst night of his life, while an extremely unwelcome guest crashes a teen’s birthday party.

episodes.name: Family Phantoms
episodes.overview: A woman’s late mother returns to make her life a living hell and the spirit of a long dead aunt is determined to keep her former home for herself.

episodes.name: Return of the Dead
episodes.overview: Michael Wordon’s house is haunted by a tragic event that occurred decades ago, the spirit of a woman searching for her family has deadly results and the ghost of a murdered woman scares a young couple from their home.

episodes.name: When Spirits Take Over
episodes.overview: A young woman is possessed by a demonic entity, a boutique falls under the spell of a spirit and something evil tries to take over Kate Kirkpatrick’s home.

episodes.name: Face to Face With Evil
episodes.overview: Deana Rotondo is tormented by the ghost of a predatory man, a couple make a shocking discovery in their dining room and Beth Shaw is stalked by something, or someone, hiding in her garage.

episodes.name: Dream Home Nightmares
episodes.overview: Wayne Mallows gets way more than he bargained for when he buys a haunted B&B; a family’s dream home turns into a nightmare for their teenage son and Linda Bogert buys the historic home of her dreams only to be attacked and possessed by evil entities.

episodes.name: Bringing In Evil
episodes.overview: A couple accidentally invites spirits into their home when they decorate their nursery, Julie Stuart falls in love with an antique dresser that turns out to be haunted and a couple opens the door for a dangerous spirit with a shocking identity.

episodes.name: Kids Under Attack
episodes.overview: Allison Gilson’s son is tormented by a terrifying creature with 1000 teeth; a young boy makes an imaginary friend but discovers it's not the only entity lurking in their new home and a ghost uses a boy to get to his mother.

episodes.name: When Ghosts Get Physical
episodes.overview: Kristine McKee’s new home is haunted by a poltergeist that gets physical with her son; a friend’s past live comes back to haunt Danielle Low with potentially life threatening results; and a woman is left bruised when a paranormal entity attacks.

episodes.name: When Ghosts Speak
episodes.overview: An evil spirit tells Dawn Whitehair to get out of her new home; Chris Page is plagued by a jealous ghost who wants him all to herself; and an entity tormenting a family possess the medium they brought in to help to convey a chilling message.

episodes.name: Home Renos From Hell
episodes.overview: Shon Winegardner discovers why he got such a good deal on the mansion he just bought; a family uncovers a spooky basement room; and when a couple finds hidden items in their home they had no idea that spirits were attached to them.

episodes.name: Multiple Spirit Disorder
episodes.overview: Sydney Drew and his wife see spirits in their home, but when their son is born the activity changes for the worse; a family moves in with a whole host of terrifying spirits; and apparitions plague another family but one of them is troubling.

episodes.name: Tormented Teens
episodes.overview: A 16-year-old girl is left scratched and shaken after being physically attacked by a malevolent spirit and a teen only makes matters worse when he uses a spirit board to try to contact the entity behind the paranormal activity in his family’s home.

episodes.name: Terrifying Visions
episodes.overview: A couple begins to witness spine chilling apparitions in their apartment while a young woman has terrifying recurring dreams that tragically come true.

episodes.name: Home Possession
episodes.overview: A blended family in Illinois have their house taken over by ghosts; a woman’s childhood home is so infested by spirits that her parents are forced to abandon it; & a spirit returns to his old stomping grounds to try to terrify the new occupants away.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Wendy and Glenn move into a new place only to discover that the previous owner never left; a woman's stepmother refuses to rest in peace; and a home built on the site of a terrible tragedy is haunted by its past.

episodes.name: Spirits That Arm
episodes.overview: A jealous entity leaves a painful mark on Joe Harb. A homeowner is left bruised and burned when she is caught in the crossfire between two territorial spirits and a pair of ghosts are so outraged at a couple's lifestyle that they become dangerously violent.

episodes.name: Uninvited Evil
episodes.overview: Feliza Jones' young nephew is attacked by something horrific, Dale Gosse gets a job at a restaurant that has a resident ghost, and Dana Hinkley is stalked by an obsessive spirit with a violent streak.

episodes.name: Animal Nightmares
episodes.overview: A family is terrorized by a supernatural beast that stalks the woods around their trailer park; a spirit leaves a disgusting calling card for Maray Francoeur-Close; and a woman adopts a stray dog.

episodes.name: Horrifying History
episodes.overview: The ghosts of prisoners past make Sandra Boyd's jailhouse ghost tours a little too scary; a woman is brutally attacked by a spirit lurking in her historic home; and a family renovate an old house only to unleash ghosts protecting a centuries old secret.

episodes.name: When Ghosts Attack Children
episodes.overview: Paranormal activity in Evelyn Martin's new home turns from strange to scary, putting her sons in danger's way; and, as a child, Crystal Martin and her sister were terrorized for years by terrifying ghosts hiding in their home.

episodes.name: Demonic Hauntings
episodes.overview: Ryan Maki is left with a painful reminder of the time he made the mistake of antagonizing a powerful negative entity; something dangerously demonic lurks in Alicia Babcock's closet; and a woman is terrorized by a demon who comes to her in a dream.

episodes.name: Within These Walls
episodes.overview: Julie Weinstein gets more than she bargained for when she buys a farmhouse haunted by an evil slave runner; a couple's new home seeps blood from the walls while a ghost targets their son; and a fixer-upper becomes a reno nightmare.

episodes.name: Creatures From Hell
episodes.overview: Monica Paulino fears for her life when stalked by the Grim Reaper, a demon torments Brittany Robinson to the edge of sanity, and an evil lizard-man terrorizes a single mother and her two daughters.

episodes.name: Voices of the Dead
episodes.overview: Lee Bailey's home turns from strange to scary as a pair of ghosts torment his family, James Creechbaum unwittingly becomes a beacon for lost spirits, and a shadowy monster violently attacks a mother desperate to protect her children.

episodes.name: Tormented By Shadows
episodes.overview: A young couple fear their 5 month old baby is the target of an evil spirit, Deanna Dunkle is attacked by dark shadows lurking in her home, and John Stewart is horrified when paranormal investigators reveal that a shadowy ghost wants to kill him.

episodes.name: Dark Dreams
episodes.overview: Carly Hall is haunted by evil spirits from her nightmares, a couple are attacked by a demon in their dreams, and Ivan Latendresse is by ghosts that implore him to hurt others and take his own life.

episodes.name: A Sense of Evil
episodes.overview: Missie Hornbeck is tormented by terrifying apparitions, a teenager is horribly attacked by a demonic beast, and Rocky Primiani experiences frightening encounters with the afterlife.

episodes.name: Territorial Ghosts
episodes.overview: Chris Houston is haunted by an evil ghost boy, a farmhouse is cursed by the presence of dark entities, and something dangerously demonic lurks in Bonnie Shukofksy's home.

episodes.name: Bringing Ghosts In
episodes.overview: Josie Haas is horrified to discover that the evil spirit of a bootlegger has followed her home, and Felicia Sills unleashes something terrifying when she unearths a Civil War era ring.

episodes.name: When Spirits Attack
episodes.overview: A monster stalks and attacks Frank Miller, a couple become the victims of paranormal activity that turns dangerously violent, and Holly Buffington is terrorized by the ghost of her ex-husband who refuses to rest in peace.

episodes.name: Evil Intent
episodes.overview: Paranormal activity in Lisa Blakely's home puts her son in danger's way, a shadowy figure terrorizes a young boy, and Micky Bailey falls victim to an evil spirit intent on inflicting harm.
